name: hlcmet
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)), wcel(c0, ccbn))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ CHilOLD, c1 ∈(CMet ` c2), c0 ∈ CBan)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, ccbn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ CBan)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CBan → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, ccbn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ CBan)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CBan → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ CBan → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cims, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CBan → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))
⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(IndMet ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, cfv(ccmet, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cims, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c1 ∈(CMet ` c2))
⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(IndMet ` c0)

comment: The induced metric on a complex Hilbert space is complete. (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
